entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 1:27 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then rain mixed with snow at times heavy. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low zero.
